typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> DimCustomer
SurrogateKey2 keyGenerate(output({undefined} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
SurrogateKey3 keyGenerate(output({undefined} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey2
SurrogateKey4 keyGenerate(output({undefined} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey3
Lookup1 keyGenerate(output({undefined} as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey4
DimCustomer lookup(broadcast: 'none')~> Lookup1
